TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RuleExpressionWalker extends System.Object
public ref class RuleExpressionWalker abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Propagates the current behavior in the expression to child nodes. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used by all <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.IRuleExpression> methods to propagate behavior to child nodes.
